config.tips.HarvestRadius: Harvest Radius tiles when wield scythe, -1 means full area effective,
config.tips.AutoInputKeyAssist: Hold crops, press this Key and click the keg to add crops in bulk to the kegs.
config.tips.AnimalArtisanMachineAutoInpu: Mayonnaise Machine, Cheese Press, Loom, Oil Maker
config.tips.SprinklerAutoInput: Hold hoe/fertilizer/seed, press Assist Key (default Shift) and click sprinkler to cultivate within the range of the sprinkler
config.tips.OtherMachineAutoInput: Machines types can be edited in config.json, default include Furnace / Fish Smoker / Recycling Machine etc.
config.tips.AllMachineAutoInput: Experimental function, if true, can perform batch input operations on all devices
config.tips.AllMachineHarvest: Experimental function, if true, will collect product on all devices (May including devices in other MOD)
